description:
Hello and Welcome,

China’s internet usage and is booming more than ever, Some 400+ million users are using internet in China everyday to search information, products, news, you know what in the Internet.

Although the Internet is a fairly open place in the rest of the world, However Chinese Internet Sphere is not easy as it sounds. Certain barriers can be seen and met everywhere such as: language (BIG ONE!) and culture.

  • Do you have a product that might sell well in China?
  • Do you have a brand that you want it to be recognized by Chinese market and consumers?
  • Are you looking for users from China?

Then you cannot afford to ignore China and Your site should be searchable and findable in China.

I will help and teach you how to make your site searchable in China with these easy to follow instructions and courses.

Thank you and best of luck!
title: Submit Your Website To Chinese Top Search Engines (Baidu)
